definition: everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

sentences.english: The two most common types of igneous rocks are granite and basalt.
sentences.chinese: 兩種最普遍的火成岩是花崗岩和玄武岩。

sentences.english: But go in knowing your general size and measurements.
sentences.chinese: 但要知道你的普遍尺碼和量度尺寸。

sentences.english: This pattern is also widespread among Near Eastern societies.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式近東社會中也很普遍。

sentences.english: The use of radiation sources in medical and other applications is widespread throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今世界各地普遍在醫療和其它應用中使用放射源。

sentences.english: Buy the pass on a message of sina to Microsoft general, the expert inside course of study expresses generally open-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 對微軟將收購新浪的傳言，業內專家普遍表示驚訝。

sentences.english: Some problems are naturally tackled that way.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種普遍的思考問題的方式。

sentences.english: Lotus Supercenter has been widely recognized by Shanghai people.
sentences.chinese: 易初蓮花購物中心已經被上海人普遍認可。

sentences.english: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
sentences.chinese: 這個新問題，在社會生活中有廣泛的普遍性。

sentences.english: Abundance One of the most common human fears is scarcity.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂貧窮是人類最普遍的恐懼之一。

sentences.english: It is a new theory universally received.
sentences.chinese: 這是一項得到普遍認可的新理論。

sentences.english: The Observatory explained that the average wind speed in Victoria Harbour did not reach storm force level.
sentences.chinese: 天文臺解釋，是維港港內普遍風速未達烈風程度。

sentences.english: The regional crisis makes people tortured by heart blank and disorientation, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 出現信仰危機，人們普遍心靈空虛，迷失方向等等。

sentences.english: That's certainly the prevailing view of marriage, American style, in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 這確實是2009年當下最普遍的美國式婚姻觀。

sentences.english: But are there any general guidelines for how long it takes before behaviours become automatic?
sentences.chinese: 但在行爲成爲自動性前有什麼普遍的指南嗎？

sentences.english: Swearing is almost a universal constant in most people’s lives.
sentences.chinese: 粗口是在大多數人的生活裏幾乎是普遍存在的。

definition: for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
in large part/the greater part/the majority
to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
